name: search_city_hotels
description: Search for a specific location or name places of a hotel (city, island).

query.description: Main parameter, it is set as a text or by longitude and latitude (also displays the nearest objects).

lookFor.description: Objects displayed in the results: city, hotel, both (default, city & hotel).

limit.description: Limitation of output results from 1 to 10, default - 10.

name: display_hotels_prices
description: The request is used to get the price of hotel rooms from the cache for the period. It doesn't contain information about room availability.

location.description: Location name (IATA code can be used as location).

checkIn.description: Date of check-in in format yyyy-mm-dd. Default: the next day.

checkOut.description: Date of check-out in format yyyy-mm-dd. Default: 3 days after date of check-in.

hotel.description: Name of the hotel (when entering the name necessarily indicate the location).

children.description: Number of children (2 to 18 years). Default: 0.

infants.description: Number of infants (0 to 2 years). Default: 0.

limit.description: Number of hotels. If this parameter is used in a query without specifying a precise ID or name of the hotel, the following applies: 4 (default) - will return for one hotel each category (Stars); 5 - return two five-stars hotel and one of the other categories; 6 - two 5 and 4-star hotel and the other one; 7 - two 5, 4 and 3-star hotels and one comfortable; 8 - all of two. And so on, with the growth parameters in turn increasing the number of hotels in every star. If the specified star hotels are no more, the issue will begin to fall and hotels 1 0 star by the same rule.

customerIp.description: Parameter to specify the user IP if the request is not sent directly, but through a proxy server.

currency.description: Currency of price like rub, usd and eur.

name: hotel_collection
description: The request recovers the list of all available separate collections. This type is used to search for hotels with a discount.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
